description: His name is unknown. As shopkeeper of the rental video shop http://anidb.net/ch26715 [Gokuraku] it was him who gave http://anidb.net/ch16491 [Youta] the video of http://anidb.net/ch15911 [Amano Ai]. Being ranked lower in the Gokuraku organisation than http://anidb.net/ch26714 [Rolec] he still attempts to help Ai and Youta.
name: Gokuraku no Aruji
